feed.title: Smit Thakkar’s Blog
feed.subtitle: "I turn coffee :coffee: into code, use tabs over spaces and never broke production."

entry.title: Postgresql in Action!
entry.content: I recently started using PostgreSQL for my projects. To fully understand the features , I’ll be exploring the features listed down here every day and try to explain you the same.
entry.summary: I recently started using PostgreSQL for my projects. To fully understand the features , I’ll be exploring the features listed down here every day and try to explain you the same.
